extracted_playbook.condition: Is the organization a manufacturer of products incorporating vulnerable QNX versions?

extracted_playbook.title: Contact BlackBerry for Patch
extracted_playbook.description: Manufacturers of products that incorporate vulnerable versions should contact BlackBerry to obtain the patch.

extracted_playbook.title: Develop and Test Software Patches
extracted_playbook.description: If developing unique versions of RTOS software, manufacturers may need to develop and test their own software patches.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the organization an end user of safety-critical systems?

extracted_playbook.title: Contact Manufacturer for Patch
extracted_playbook.description: End users of safety-critical systems should contact the manufacturer of their product to obtain a patch.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Available Patch
extracted_playbook.description: If a patch is available, users should apply the patch as soon as possible.

extracted_playbook.title: Apply Manufacturer's Recommended Mitigation Measures
extracted_playbook.description: If a patch is not available, users should apply the manufacturer's recommended mitigation measures until the patch can be applied.
